blogPost.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
blogPost.body: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
blogPost.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
blogPost.author: Saber Chaabani

localize.description: 递归是一款关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。这是一个完美的游戏，喜欢困难的谜题的人。你的目标是帮助小机器人收集所有的宝石，找到正确的模式，并将其转化为一个简短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一个关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。

localize.description: 遞歸是一款關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲，喜歡困難的謎題的人。你的目標是幫助小機器人收集所有的寶石，找到正確的模式，並將其轉化爲一個簡短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一個關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。

previous.title: US Inflation expectations continue their unrelenting surge, highest levels since 2008. Tomorrow the Fed will tell you there's no inflation and do it with a straight face. https://t.co/zhhVVdr6hs

localize.full_text: 美国通胀预期继续无休止地飙升，为2008年以来最高水平。明天美联储会告诉你没有通胀，而且做得很直白。https://t.co/zhhVVdr6hs。
